title: Bent Knees Break Chains
description:
While the chain of events isn't always your choice, your next decision still is. In “Bent Knees Break Chains,” we learn that our future isn’t defined by what happens to us, but is influenced by our choices instead.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
